thread.title: U.S. Sanctions Official to Leave Treasury Department

author: Samuel Rubenfeld
title: U.S. Sanctions Official to Leave Treasury Department

organizations.name: u.s. sanctions official to leave treasury department
treasury’s office of foreign assets control

text:
The top U.S. official in charge of maintaining and enforcing U.S. sanctions is leaving his post. John E. Smith, director of Treasury’s Office of Foreign Assets Control, or OFAC, will leave the position early next month, Treasury said Thursday. Mr. Smith’s departure was for personal reasons, according to several people familiar with the matter. Mr. […]
